thread.title: Ground News - Visiting shoppers impressed with Nelson's trees, weather and parking
thread.title_full: Ground News - Visiting shoppers impressed with Nelson's trees, weather and parking

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Visiting shoppers impressed with Nelson's trees, weather and parking
text:
Summary by Ground News Visitors to Nelson Tasman are finding a lot to love about the region. Cantabrians Alex Galbraith and Emma Quinn were on their way to the Suter art gallery when they spoke to the Nelson Mail on Friday. Auckland seniors Anita and Brian were on a reconnaissance trip for a potential move to Richmond, and appeared quite smitten with downtown Nelson. Share menu More
